scripts.build: yarn build-boot && yarn --cwd=../../../node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build && echo "building psychic app..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && yarn build:package-json
scripts.build-boot: echo "bootstrapping psychic..." && rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && yarn build:package-json
scripts.build:core: rm -rf dist && PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build && echo "building psychic core..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build-core.json
scripts.sync: NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build-boot && NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build
scripts.syncb: NODE_ENV=development yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build-boot && NODE_ENV=development yarn dream sync:config-cache && yarn --cwd=node_modules/@rvohealth/dream build && yarn build
scripts.uspec:slow: PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 yarn psyts sync:all --core && PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 TS_SAFE=1 jest --config=./spec/unit/jest.config.js --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.fspec:slow: PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 yarn psyts sync:all --core && PSYCHIC_CORE_DEVELOPMENT=1 TS_SAFE=1 jest --config=./spec/features/jest.config.js --runInBand --forceExit
scripts.spec-server: TS_SAFE=1 FEATURE_SPEC_RUN=1 DEV_SERVER_PORT=7770 PORT=7770 npx ts-node --transpile-only ./test-app/spec-server.ts
scripts.lint: yarn run eslint --no-warn-ignored "src/**/*.ts" "spec/**/*.ts" "test-app/**/*.ts" "boot/**/*.ts" && yarn run prettier . --check
